books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher tracks down the owner of a pawned West Point class ring and stumbles upon a large criminal enterprise.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LINE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Three students at a sleazy for-profit law school hope to expose the student-loan banker who runs it.
books.name: THE ROOSTER BAR

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: A symbology professor goes on a perilous quest with a beautiful museum director.
books.name: ORIGIN

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: While he investigates the murder of two pharmacists, an old case comes back to haunt Harry Bosch.
books.name: TWO KINDS OF TRUTH

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Boyd Morrison
books.description: Juan Cabrillo chases a Filipino insurgent during a megastorm.
books.name: TYPHOON FURY

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark and Alafair Burke
books.description: Laurie Moran investigates the murder of a wealthy widow who was pushed from the roof of the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
books.name: EVERY BREATH YOU TAKE

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: A new collection of poetry from the author of "Milk and Honey."
books.name: THE SUN AND HER FLOWERS

books.author: by Mary Balogh
books.description: A relationship develops between the new Earl of Riverdale and a wealthy recluse.
books.name: SOMEONE TO WED

books.author: by Alexander McCall Smith
books.description: During an investigation, Precious Ramotswe encounters a man from her past and a nurse who has her last name.
books.name: THE HOUSE OF UNEXPECTED SISTERS

books.author: by Richard Paul Evans
books.description: A romance writer delves into a stranger's past when his estranged mother leaves her extremely stuffed house to him.
books.name: THE NOEL DIARY

books.author: by Kristen Ashley
books.description: A divorced sheriff in Nebraska begins a relationship with a woman who recently moved into town, even as he must track down a killer.
books.name: COMPLICATED

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Virgil Flowers is called to investigate in Trippton, Minn., when a local bank's president is found dead in a nearly frozen river.
books.name: DEEP FREEZE

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Karen Kingsbury
books.description: A lawyer defends a public high school principal who starts an after-school Bible study program.
books.name: IN THIS MOMENT

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: The fears of seven teenagers are rekindled in their adult lives by the terrifying title character. Originally published in 1986.
books.name: IT
